string.text: Debts: Bring the money
Vano owes money for his new suit, but he can't deliver it, as the interest grows too fast. He asked me to deal with this problem.
Debts: Return to Vano
I should tell Vano that I've paid his debt.
Debts: Deal with the bandits
Paying Vano's debt too a sharp turn for the worse. I must eliminate the bandits.
Hostage: Receive the award from Mityai's friends
I saved Mityai. I should meet his friends back at the bar and get my reward.
Hostage: Free Mityai
Hostage: Talk to Bear when ready
I need to talk with Bear before going to save the hostage.
Hostage: Free Mityai by force
I need to kill the bandits to save the stalker named Mityai.
Hostage: Meet with the stalkers
Several stalkers will help to save the hostage. I will have to meet with them at night for a joint attack the bandits.
Hostage: Reach an agreement about the ransom
I have to strike a deal with the leader of the bandits about Mityai's ransom.
I have to save a stalker named Mityai, who was taken hostage by bandits.
Hostage: Exfiltrate the bandit camp with Mityai
It's too dangerous to stay too long in the bandit camp. I have to escort Mityai to the perimeter.
Hostage: Talk to Mityai
Mityai's in relative safety. I should talk to him about any further action.
Road to Pripyat: Talk to a technician about the underpass
It's clear that there's an underground passageway leading to Pripyat. It's been shut-down, filled with gas and sealed, so I need to find technology that can run the generator and open the gateway.
The memory module is in the hands of a master. I have to wait until he unlocks its information.
Unmanned Reconnaissance: Unlock the memory module
Unmanned Reconnaissance: Take the memory module from Nitro
Unmanned Reconnaissance: Take the memory module from Novikov
Nitro cracked the memory module. I should pick up the module to examine what's recorded on it.
Novikov unlocked the module. I should take the module and examine what's recorded on it.
I managed to extract a memory module from a spy drone. I should give it to someone who can crack the security lock.
Unmanned Reconnaissance: Wait for the technician to unlock the memory module
Oasis: Confirm its existence with evidence
I found the Oasis, it really does have healing properties. I have to secure evidence of its existence and bring it to the scientists.
Oasis: Bring evidence to the scientists
I found the Oasis, it really does have healing properties. I have bring the artifact to the scientists.
Oasis: Check the veracity of the legend

Ozersky, a scientist from the bunker, asked me to try and find the legendary Oasis. If the rumours are true, then it must be a reservoir of healing water. However, no one knows for sure whether it actually exists.
Kopachi: Go and see the countryside with Yar.
Uncle Yar needs some help. I should go with him to the village of Kopachi.
Kopachi: Eliminate the mercenaries
It seems that uncle Yar foresaw the appearance of mercenaries. I have to eliminate them.
Kopachi: Stay near uncle Yar
Uncle Yar asked me to stay near him and remain quiet.
Kopachi: Talk to uncle Yar
All of the mercenaries are dead. I should talk to uncle Yar and get an explanation.
AC Psi Factor: Bring the sample back to the scientists
I should bring the sample I found to Herman, as agreed. It seems that this semi-anomalous object is the source of the alternating psi-radiation.
AC Psi Factor: Investigate the source
I have to examine the tunnel in search of an anomalous sample. Scientists believe that the alternating psi-field has a source and that it may be an artifact.
AC Psi Factor: Meet with Poplar's squad
Poplar's squad went to the tunnel with the alternating psi-field. I have to go and meet them there.
AC Psi Factor: Talk to Poplar
I'll join Poplar's squad and enter the tunnel with the alternating psi-radiation. Stalkers will cover the tunnel while I locate the sample Herman asked me to retrieve.
Bring Nitro all radio tech materials
Nitro needs materials for his electronics hobby. I can give him those I've already found or go and look around the place again.
Radiotech: Get the materials for Nitro
Nitro needs materials for his electronics hobby. According to him, it would make sense to look for them at the cement plant.
Theft: Find out who could steal your stuff
I should ask stalkers at Yanov, see if they didn't see anyone suspicious or know someone who could steal stuff from my personal locker.
Theft: Check the train station
I should check the old train station, apparently the suspicious stalker who could have stolen my stuff went there.
Theft: Retrieve my belongings
Snag hid all of the stolen items in a secret compartment, located in the sewer entryway.
Abnormal Plantlife: Get a sample of the vegetation
An anomalous area emerged recently on the edge of the quarry. Ozersky asked me to get a sample for study.
Abnormal Plantlife: Bring the sample to Ozersky
I have to bring Ozersky the sample he ordered. In return, he'll persuade Herman to part with a scientific suit.
Hunting: Destroy the unknown mutants
A group of stalkers came across some strange mutants in the tunnels north of the Jupiter factory. I need to sweep the place and kill all mutants that might reside there.
Hunting: Receive reward from Tutsan for killing the burers
I've killed the strange mutants in the tunnels north of the Jupiter factory. I should notify Tutsan and pick up my reward.
Hypothesis: Place the scanner in the centre of the clearing
To test Ozersky's hypothesis, I have to install a scanner near the centre of the clearing.
Hypothesis: Wait until the end of the experiment
The scanner is activated and records data. I need to wait until it collects enough information to confirm the hypothesis.
Hypothesis: Collect the scanner
I've collected enough data to confirm Ozersky's hypothesis. I should collect the scanner.
Hypothesis: Give the scanner to Ozersky
I have to give the scanner to Ozersky. The collected data should be enough for an unambiguous evaluation of his hypothesis.
Hunting: Kill the marsh bloodsuckers
Near the swamp north of the cement factory, a pack of marsh bloodsuckers was sighted. Local stalkers requested its destruction.
Hunting: Receive Tutsan's reward for killing the marsh bloodsuckers
I've killed the pack of marsh bloodsuckers. I should pick up my reward from the local stalkers at Tutsan.
Nocturnal Hunt: Kill the chimera
The chimera is a nocturnal predator, her daytime lair is unknown. I need to find and kill her at night, when she comes out to hunt at the ventilation complex.
Nocturnal Hunt: Tell Tutsan about the death of the chimera
The killer chimera is dead and Fox the hunter has been avenged. I have to tell Tutsan about this.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits

Nitro asked me to find two sets of tools: one for fine and one for rough work. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits

Nitro asked me to find two sets of tools: one for rough work and one for calibration. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits
Nitro asked me to find a set of tools for rough work. He not only pay for the tool, but also be able to produce more serious modernization of weapons or body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits

Nitro asked me to find two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for calibration. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits
Nitro asked me to find a set of tools for fine work. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits
Nitro asked me to find a set of tools for calibration. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Tools: Bring Nitro the tool kits

Nitro asked me to find three sets of tools: one for fine work, one for rough work and one for calibration. He will not only pay for the tools themselves, but he'll also be able to perform more serious modernizations of weapons and body armour.
Pripyat-1: Find a suit with a closed-circuit breathing system
To enter the Pripyat-1 underpass I need a suit with a closed-circuit breathing system, as the overpass is filled with carbon dioxide.
Pripyat-1: Bring Rogue to Zulus
I have to bring Rogue to Zulus and introduce him as our team mate. I doubt he'll be happy about seeing a Monolith suit, though.
Pripyat-1: Talk to Rogue about a protective suit
Pripyat-1 underpass is filled with carbon dioxide. I need to make sure that Rogue has a suit with a closed-circuit breathing system.
Pripyat-1: Gather a squad for an expedition to Pripyat

Nitro can open the gateway to the Pripyat-1 underpass, but he refuses to go to Jupiter without proper protection and recommended that I should bring a couple of fighters along for our trip through the tunnels. Zulus joined my squad and recommended a few others as candidates.
Pripyat-1: Talk to Zulus about an expedition to Pripyat

Nitro can open the gateway to the Pripyat-1 underpass, but he refuses to go to Jupiter without proper protection and recommended that I should bring a couple of fighters along for our trip through the tunnels. He said that I should talk with Zulus, who can help me assemble a squad.
Pripyat-1: Bring Sokolov to Zulus
Sokolov agrees to go to Pripyat and I've arranged a protective suit for him. I need to take him to Zulus and introduce him as our team mate.
Pripyat-1: Talk to Sokolov about the protective suit
Pripyat-1: Talk to Ozersky about the suit for Sokolov
Sokolov can use a scientist suit, but Herman is unlikely to give him one. I should talk to Ozersky, he's far more kind and agreeable.
Pripyat-1: Tell Sokolov about the scientific suit
Ozersky was very pleased with my sample of the vegetation. He asked me to tell Sokolov that a protective suit will be waiting for him.
Pripyat-1 underpass is filled with carbon dioxide. I need to tell Sokolov that he will need a suit with a closed-circuit breathing system.
Pripyat-1: Give Vano money for the suit
The suit that forced Vano to become indebted to bandits has a closed-circuit breathing system. Vano had to pay his debts and now he needs 3000 to buy the suit back.
Pripyat-1: Bring Vano to Zulus
Vano agreed to go to Pripyat with me. I need to take him to Zulus and introduce him as our team mate. This trip will help him to get back his cash.
Pripyat-1: Talk to Vano about a protective suit
The Pripyat-1 underpass is filled with carbon dioxide. I need to tell Vano that he will need a suit with a closed-circuit breathing system.
Flint is that damn bastard Soroka. I have to either tell the Creek stalkers or one of the factions about his deeds and teach him a lesson.
Flint is obviously giving himself too much credit, talking about stuff he didn't even see. I ought to straighten him out.
Lack of Merit: Deal with Flint
Flint obviously loves to credit himself with the work of others. I ought to put him in his rightful place.
Flint's gloating is way too much. I need to show him the truth.
Flint is that damn bastard Soroka. I have to either tell the Creek stalkers or one of the factions about his deeds and teach him a lesson.
Anomalous Studies: Get the scanners from the technician
I need to get the scanners from Novikov. Herman wants to collect artifact statistics, so I have to place each device in the centre of an anomaly.
Anomalous Studies: Place the scanners in the anomalies
Anomalous Studies: A reward
I should pick up my reward from Herman, since he can collect his statistics now.
I need to install the scanners in the centre of each anomaly. Herman wants to collect artifact statistics, so I have to place them in several anomalies.
Academic Deal: Bring Garik a Kolobok
Garik would like to finish his contract, but he needs a Kolobok for this. I should bring him one.
Academic Deal: Bring Garik a Meat Chunk
Garik would like to finish his contract, but he needs a Meat Chunk for this. I should bring him one.
Academic Deal: Bring Garik a Kolobok and a Meat Chunk
Garik would like to finish his contract, but he needs a Kolobok and a Meat Chunk for this. I should bring him one.
Academic Deal: Delivered the artefacts
Garik received both artefacts. His contract is now completed.
Past Duty: Choose whom to give the PDA
I found General Tachenko's PDA. He died in a spatial anomaly long ago, but his last words are very interesting... Many groups will be interested in the last minutes of the legendary founder of Duty.
Anomalous Activity: Investigate the area with an enhanced detector
Scientist scanners picked up anomalous activity north of the bunker. I should explore the location with an enhanced detector.
Scientific Guard: Find reliable people
The scientist bunker was left without any protection. I need to help them find a group of reliable people to replace the mercs.
Scientific Guard: Return to Herman for a reward
I found a new protection for the scientist bunker. I should go back to Herman and get my reward.
Tomorrow's Technology: Find documents at the Jupiter factory
Herman is interested in what was developed at the Jupiter factory before it closed down. I have to search the administration building for documentation.
Tomorrow's Technology: Return the classified documents to Herman
Documents I've found state that all technical documentation was removed from the factory. I should give this document to Herman, at least.
Tomorrow's Technology: Deliver classified documents and Black's PDA to Herman

While searching for the documentation, I was attacked by mercenaries. Judging by Black's PDA, they were tasked with preventing any classified information from reaching the scientists. Regardless, I couldn't find the technical documentation, just a note that it was removed from the factory. Herman would be interested in both the PDA and this document.
Monolith Survivors: Talk with Yanov residents about shelter

I've encountered a Monolith squad, who are not fanatical fighters any more, free of the Monolith's whispers. They are now looking for shelter from blowouts and mutants. I should talk with Yanov residents if they'd be willing to give asylum to former Monolithans.
I should bring Duty recruiters to the former Monolith squad. If they accept them, these former fanatics will be able to enter Yanov and be sheltered from mutants and blowouts.
I should bring Freedom recruiters to the former Monolith squad. If they accept them, these former fanatics will be able to enter Yanov and be sheltered from mutants and blowouts.
Monolith Survivors: Take recruiters to the former Monolith squad
Anomalous Studies: Provide cover for stalkers
It seems anomaly measurements attracted mutants. I have to cover the stalkers until they finish taking measurements.
Anomalous Studies: Provide cover for stalkers
It seems anomaly measurements attracted zombies from Kopachi. I have to cover the stalkers until they finish taking measurements.
Anomalous Studies: Talk to Herman
We've finished taking anomaly measurements. I need to inform the scientists and collect my reward.
Anomalous Studies: Talk to the stalkers
I should talk to the stalkers and choose which anomaly to measure.
Anomalous Studies: Talk to the stalkers
We've taken all the necessary measurements. We can now return to the scientist bunker.
Anomalous Studies: Talk to the stalkers
We've taken all the necessary measurements. Time to pick another anomaly.
Anomalous Studies: Provide cover for stalkers
Herman gave me a job: I have to cover their stalkers while they are taking measurements of the anomalies.
Stingray-4: Investigate crash site
Stingray-4: Identify what fried the electronics
Investigate Stingray-4s crash site.
I need to identify the source of the powerful electric shock that hit Stingray-4.
Stingray-1: Give the black box to a technician for decrypting
Stingray-1's black box survived the landing. I need to give it to a technician, so that he can decrypt its contents for me.
Stingray-1: Waiting until the black box is decrypted
Nitro accepted the black box for decryption. He estimated that he will need about three hours to crack it, so I have to wait.
Stingray-1: return to Nitro for information from the "black box»
Nitro already had to finish the decryption. Must return to him for information from the "black box».
Stingray-1: Investigate the crash site
Investigate Stingray-1's crash site.
Pripyat-1: Reach Pripyat
We need to pass through the Pripyat-1 underpass and reach the military evacuation zone in Pripyat.
Road to Pripyat: Check the chemical workshops of the Jupiter factory
The chemical workshops at Jupiter should have information about the Pripyat-1 underpass conservation method. It was supposedly filled with some gas.
Road to Pripyat: Check the administration building of the Jupiter factory

The Guide does not know a safe route to Pripyat. He suggested that I should look for information concerning underground tunnels that can lead from Jupiter to the city. Administration sounds like a good place to start.
Road to Pripyat: Check the electrical appliances workshop
Documents found in Jupiter's administration mention evacuating the industrial complex from the factory. I should seek further information in the electrical appliances workshop.
Road to Pripyat: Check the transport gateway to the Pripyat-1 underpass
The entrance to the underground underpass is a transport gateway. I have to check that place and look for any info about the underpass.
Road to Pripyat: Check the first division of the Jupiter Factory
The first division should have information on the Pripyat-1 underpass, which can be very useful.
Road to Pripyat: Check the delivery department of the Jupiter factory
According to records from the electrical appliances workshop, the evacuation was to include the delivery department. I need to check that place.
Road to Pripyat: Check the repair shop at the Jupiter factory
The delivery department was storing information about losses of Product No. 62 at the repair workshops. I have to check it out.
Road to Pripyat: Ask the guide
According to the black box recording, soldiers were to assemble at evacuation zone B28, located in Pripyat. I need to find a way to get there - time to talk to the guide.
Duty Cache: Take your reward
Duty Cache: Meet with Morgan
In return for my silence, Morgan agreed to grant me access to Duty's cache. I have to meet him near the quarry.
In order to advance further, you need to open the gate.
In order to advance further, you need to open the door.
In order to advance further, you need to turn on the power.
In order to advance further, you need to open the gate. Presumably, this can be done from the control room.
Study Group: Find new stalkers
The research group which worked for the scientists is dead. I need to find them new employees, so that their work can continue.
Study Group: Return to Herman for a reward
I've found a new research group for Herman, he owes me. Time to collect.
Pripyat-1: Perform a task for Ozersky
In order for Sokolov to get a protective suit, I need to perform a task for Ozersky and bring him a sample of an anomalous plant.
Nitro needs materials for his electronics hobby. I can find them in the cement plant.
Flint left Sliver to die in the anomaly. I have to confront him.
Revenge: Avenge Sliver

I have to find the guy who left Sliver to die in the anomaly and took his artefact and left. Unfortunately, Sliver did not have enough time to tell me the name of the stalker - I only know that he was a Freedom fighter».
Colonel Shulga allowed me to take any equipment from the Duty cache, if we can recapture it from Freedom.
Loki allowed me to loot the Duty cache while his men hold the fort.
